articles.author: Brendan Marks
articles.title: UNC gets job done against Wagner, but much tougher test awaits in Michigan State - The Athletic
articles.description: The Tar Heels blew out No. 16 seed Wagner by 28 but were sloppy in some areas. Now here comes a program you don't want to see in Round 2.
articles.content:
CHARLOTTE, N.C. There is reality, and then perception.
Reality is a final score: No. 1 North Carolina 90, No. 16 Wagner 62. The top-seeded team in the West Region, a blue blood with the most wins in… [+5957 chars]
